text.section: A temporary delicensure of licensed bed capacity of a facility under this subtitle does not require a certificate of need review.

The Maryland Health Care Commission shall retain the bed capacity of a facility on its inventory for up to 2 years, provided that the owner or licensed operator of the facility provides written notice to the Commission at least 30 days before the proposed temporary delicensure.
